title: Value returned by enigma - describe behavior

content.question: Which of the following best describes the value returned by the method?

choices.label: The index of a column in  values  that contains at least one element equal to  target
The index of a row in  values  that contains at least one element equal to  target
The number of times that an element equal to  target  appears in column  x  of  values
The number of times that an element equal to  target  appears in row  x  of  values

content.answer: The number of times that an element equal to  target  appears in row  x  of  values

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
